name: Ice Cream Shop

intents.description: The user asks about the prices of our products.
If customers want to shop online, we will ask them what product(s) they want to purchase.
The user requests for the store hours.

examples.text: I want to change the order
I need to change my order

intents.description: A user declines the current order.
If customers want to visit one of our stores in person, we will ask for their location to provide them our nearest store.
A user asks what are the sizes of ice cream/frozen yogurt.
The user asks what flavors are available.

description: This chatbot is designed to interact with customers at the fictional store "Ahmed's Ice Cream and Frozen Yogurt."

values: Welcome to Ahmed's Ice Cream and Frozen Yogurt!  May I have your name?

The available flavors are banana, butter pecan, caramel, cherry, chocolate, coffee, cookie dough, cookies n' cream, cotton candy, mint, moose tracks, neapolitan, peanut butter, pistachio, raspberry, rocky road, strawberry, tutti frutti, and vanilla.

values: Would you like to buy ice cream or frozen yogurt, $username?  Due to high demand, each customer can only make one order at a time.  Frozen yogurt costs \$0.25 more than ice cream.

Are you interested in purchasing ice cream, $username?  Or would you like to try our frozen yogurt?  Because of high demand, you can only make one order at a time.  Please note that frozen yogurt costs \$0.25 more.
